::Killfest/Liono/EndBringer/Koj/Dark Convoy::

Koj spins around, finally coming to a stop. He sees EndBringer coming 
at him and pulls out his missile launcher. He fires, sending 
EndBringer flying back into Killfest.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Liono clenches his teeth tighter as Motormaster's hands tighten 
around his neck. He draws back his sword and stabs again, but the 
lack of mechfluid to his head was starting to make him dizzy.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Seeing that his brother is in trouble, Dark sets the LA2 on autopilot 
and edjects, flying toward Motormaster. He fires two blasma blasts at 
the bot.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> "Owww" Motormaster screams in agony, but grits his teeth, desperate 
to hold
> on to his opponent, he tries to wrap his other hand around, as his 
first
> squeezes, "Now Maximal," he gasps between pained breath "I will 
crush you
> with, uhhhhh ,uhh my bare hands" he shouts.
